name: Town Warrior
description:
Town Warrior will be a PC game, developed using Unity, by Caio Farias, Daniel Lopes and Diogo Barata .

The main idea of Town Warrior is to be a city building game with some action/adventure elements and enemies that try to stop the progress and can even make the game end.

The game will also have the possibility to gather resources, allowing the player to construct new buildings.

The game will focus on a medieval theme where it will be necessary to explore, fight, build and gather resources allowing the player to evolve in the game, expande the town, kill enemies and increase the population.

With these features, we want to create a 3rd person game, with the option to go to a bird's eye view to build the city.
